headline: How the Narrative Surrounding Newmont Is Shifting with Upgrades and a Brighter Gold Outlook
summary: Newmont’s fair value estimate has inched up to about $104.53 from roughly $103.42 as analysts factor in slightly stronger fundamentals and refined pricing assumptions. This modest lift comes alongside a small uptick in the discount rate to around 8.19% from about 8.11% and a higher revenue growth outlook of roughly 6.24% versus 5.61%. Together, these changes reflect a cautiously optimistic shift in the stock’s narrative. Stay tuned to see how you can track these evolving expectations and keep...
